titleStmt.title: The chancellor's address & confession to both houses of Parliament whereby his black crimes, illegal actings, damnable designs and wicked intentions are laid bare and open to satisfie the nation.
titleStmt.author: Jeffreys, George Jeffreys, Baron, 1644 or 5-1689.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Baron George Jeffreys. Cf. BM; Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
